charaepi_ch0142_00_athena/2301_1101_0100:
The sun went down, and
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was hurrying home.
charaepi_ch0142_00_athena/2301_1101_0200: Suddenly, someone called out to [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ]...
charaepi_ch0142_00_athena/2301_1201_0300: A child shouldn’t be out on the street at night...
charaepi_ch0142_00_athena/2301_1201_0400: *chuckle* You might run into some bad people.
charaepi_ch0142_00_athena/2301_0401_0700:
Exactly. You never know what might happen if you
run into someone scary like me.
charaepi_ch0142_00_athena/2301_0402_1000:
I might be on my way to do something beyond
your imagination.
charaepi_ch0142_00_athena/2301_1201_1100: Haha, no need to get so tense.
charaepi_ch0142_00_athena/2301_1201_1200:
I have no intention of causing you any harm right
now. Don’t worry.
charaepi_ch0142_00_athena/2301_1201_1300:
I just saw you on my way back from training
with Arbok.
charaepi_ch0142_00_athena/2301_1201_1400:
Arbok’s biggest weapon is the pattern on its
stomach that looks like a scary face.
charaepi_ch0142_00_athena/2301_1201_1500:
To get the most out of it, we usually train when
it’s bright so we can see it clearly.
charaepi_ch0142_00_athena/2301_0401_1700: Doing it that way is just more efficient.
charaepi_ch0142_00_athena/2301_0302_1800:
Because that’s best for your
partner Pokémon?
charaepi_ch0142_00_athena/2301_0402_1900: It’s simply more efficient that way.
charaepi_ch0142_00_athena/2301_1201_2000:
No one would choose to train in a way that has
little return, right?
charaepi_ch0142_00_athena/2301_1201_2100:
I’m choosing the time that gives me the best results
and strengthens Arbok with the least effort.
charaepi_ch0142_00_athena/2301_1201_2300:
Arbok and I are both tools that should be useful
to Giovanni.
charaepi_ch0142_00_athena/2301_1201_2400:
We don’t need a bond or feelings for
one another.
charaepi_ch0142_00_athena/2301_0401_2700: Yeah, I thought you’d say that.
charaepi_ch0142_00_athena/2301_1201_3000: I don’t think you’ll ever understand.
charaepi_ch0142_00_athena/2301_1201_3100:
If we can be useful for Giovanni and it leads to
his happiness...
charaepi_ch0142_00_athena/2301_1201_3200: it doesn’t matter if I’m seen as a convenient tool.
charaepi_ch0142_00_athena/2301_1201_3300: It seems Arbok feels the same.
charaepi_ch0142_00_athena/2301_1201_3400: My Pokémon is the perfect tool.
charaepi_ch0142_00_athena/2301_1201_3500: I think she’s turned out wonderfully.
charaepi_ch0142_00_athena/2301_1201_3600:
No matter how she’s treated, she’s happy to battle
for me and Giovanni.
charaepi_ch0142_00_athena/2301_1201_3700:
She understands the role she’s been given
very well.
charaepi_ch0142_00_athena/2301_1201_3800:
I respect Giovanni more than anyone, and Arbok
will battle by my side for him.
charaepi_ch0142_00_athena/2301_1201_3900: So she’s an important tool...and also my partner.
charaepi_ch0142_00_athena/2301_1201_4000:
Love and trust manifest in different ways for
different people and Pokémon.
